<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Power BI Developer

Location: Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Business Intelligence Developer
This is an exciting and high-impact position that will involve assisting in the development and support of Valiant BI, an internal and external platform used by Valiant Residential and their clients. The individual in this role will work closely with the senior leadership team to help shape the future of this platform. They will extensively utilize their skills in Power BI, data warehousing, modeling, and data analysis to further develop the Valiant BI platform into a scalable and high-performing cross-business unit analytics platform.
More specifically, this role will be accountable for overseeing and delivering data visualizations that deliver insights for fast and accurate, fact-based decision-making.
This requires identifying and understanding key issues, strong analytical thinking, and the ability to conduct quantitative analysis and develop conclusions based on analysis/research.
Key ResponsibilitiesImplement robust, reliable, and custom reporting and visualizations using Power BI.Develop and maintain self-service reporting solutions and/or automated solutions.Use SQL as main tool for data preparation: extracting, cleansing, aggregation and summarizing data to create meaningful visualizations.Ensure the quality and accuracy of data by creating automated testing scripts.Participate in the design and implementation of logical and physical data models.Review proposed production changes to ensure the highest quality data standards and lowest production impact.Navigate, understand, and leverage existing complex data structures for reporting.Proactively make recommendations and identify opportunities to solve business problems through models, charts, graphs, and dashboards.Maintain, update, and distribute client-facing and internal dashboards that track multifamily analytics and Key Performance Indicators.Support production BI solutions by monitoring and tuning SQL queries and data loadsAddressing user questions concerning data integrityMonitoring performance and communicating functional and technical issues proactivelyInteract with senior management, department leaders, and other employees to develop and reach an agreement on reporting requirements and prioritiesCoordinate system development with IT to enhance automation and visibility
Consistently ranked as a “Top Places to Work” by the Oklahoman, Houston Chronicle, and Dallas Morning News, Valiant Residential is proud to be a key player in the property management industry. In addition to exciting opportunities for growth and development, we pride ourselves on providing outstanding benefits and time off.
Benefits:3 Medical Plans to choose from (1 plan is free to team members)DentalVisionLife Insurance (free to team members)Voluntary Life Insurance and Ancillary plans for purchase401k plan with Company matchTime Off:PTO (personal time off)Sick TimeFloating Holidays (2 per year)Your Birthday off with pay

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
